name: 9 pack: The Hedgehog Collection of cards
description:
(You may click on the image to see it larger)

This is a pack of 9 quality reproduction cards; including one of each of the beautiful designs selected for the collection.

This one is called: Big Bang...

...to name a few: 

Bubble Act,   Prickle Tricks,   Urchin Searchin...


There is a film of the Hedgehogs in all their glory:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FBdqN_Bhr5A

Or you can click on the sidebar: OUCH!...Roots! to see it.



Pssssst.....buy an OUCH! pack and get an 'I love you card' FREE!

A small postage & packing fee is added to the price for you to see before you get to check out.


Original Watercolour designs by Gwen Turner 

name: 6 pack: Hedgehog mini fine prints (posh postcards)
description:
These 3 designs are not included in The Hedgehog Card Collection, they are available as a pack of quality prints on Da Vinci Archival White paper, two of each design. Each has the illustrators monogram stamped on the bottom corner and space on the back for a message:

The design on the top of the pile here is called: Balloonatic.

(The same list of designs are available as framed, hand tinted etchings; people generally like to buy these in person).


Pssssst.....buy an OUCH! pack and get an 'I love you card' FREE!

A small postage & packing fee is added to the price for you to see before you get to check out.


Original Watercolour designs by Gwen Turner 

name: 8 pack: Christmas Hedgehog cards

This Christmas Hedgehog package comes as a total of 8 quality reprodution cards; each with an envelope, including two of each selected design:

The example here is called: Holly Hog...

name: 3 pack: hand collaged "I Love You" cards
description:
Opening the post has become a whole new arena!

This pack comes as 3 hand collaged cards, carefully chosen from the thousands of hidden designs inside envelopes onto fine recycled Fabriano card, (each with an envelope).

OUCH! will create a nice combination for you, there are so many lovely colourful and subtle patterns.

If you like lighter pastel colours, bold dark ones, perhaps a mix of both, then do add a note at checkout and OUCH! will sort it!

(For example, OUCH! is partial to the Barclays bank ones...kind of a Navy Blue brick-work pattern).


Pssssst.....buy an OUCH! pack and get an 'I love you card' FREE!

A small postage & packing fee is added to the price for you to see before you get to check out.


Original designs by Gwen Turner 

name: 3 pack: Valentines Snog Cards
description:
OUCH! creates a whole host of wonderful Valentines Snog Cards; available as a slender, though tender pack of 3 designs. 

Fine quality reproductions printed on to both sides of recycled Fabriano card, each with an envelope. 

Because it isn’t really worth OUCH! selling just one online, you can trust OUCH! won’t tell anyone if you buy our 3 pack!


There are even 3 types of pack; or OUCH! can mix and match for you...


His and Hers,   Hers and Hers,   His and His... 


At the sidebar: 'Snogs...closer look...' you can see more of the designs, which keep on coming...every year OUCH! pops something out.

Add a note at the check out for your mix!


Pssssst.....buy an OUCH! pack and get an 'I love you card' FREE!

A small postage & packing fee is added to the price for you to see before you get to check out.


Original designs by Gwen Turner 
